transcript.title: STATEMENT BY THE PRIME MINSITER, THE HON PJ KEATING MP
transcript.content:
PRIME MINISTER 50/ 92
STATEMENT BY THE PRIME MINISTER, HON. P. J. KEATING, MP
MINISTERIAL ARRANGEMENTS
The Federal Caucus of the Labor Party will meet in
Canberra next Tuesday to elect a new Minister.
Following that decision by Caucus I will announce new
Cabinet and Ministerial arrangements.
The Minister for Aviation and Shipping, Senator Bob
Collins, is acting Minister for Transport and
Communications. CANBERRA May 19, 1992 7059
